OrgName.entry: RED ROPE SOCIALIST WALKING AND CLIMBING CLUB, SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: Socialist club for walkers, mountaineers and rock climbers. Organises day, weekend and week-long trips to mountains and the countryside. Fortnightly walks and climbs on an informal basis. Strives to be non-sexist, non-racist and non-elitist. Membership rates and trip costs based on ability to pay.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Alternate Sundays, 9.50 am for 10am start (with car share to walk starting point)
